title: I really wish Fiora's passive wasnt rng
body:
I like the idea of hitting specific sides but a rng passive doesnt seem like a grand duelist. 
(Yes I know it has a pattern but its still rng)

replies.body: I wish it would start at the front and rotate clockwise
If it was always the front they would have to lower the damage on that but maybe the more vitals you hit in a row the more each one does?
to be fair if you could control it yourself you would always pick a frontside vital then q -> walk away

I think it is not about you chosing, it is about it not being RNG. Like, if you hit someone, the vital would appear behind the target or something like this. You would know where it will proc, but you don't choose it.
Honestly I think her passive should be different
I just rest it with movement when its not a useful spawn. Check enemy minion hp values and right click away when you need a new trigger. Never found this to be a difficult mechanic personally.

It's not difficult at all. It just doesn't make sense for a champion that is supposed to a high skill cap champion to have an rng passive. Her passive in lane phase inst fun or engaging its just you resetting every time to get the good vital
